publicationStmt.p: Digital edition hosted on and GitHub:

bibl.title: Looting Soldier
bibl.ref: Article That Supplied Information for Markup

body.desc: This piece in New Orleans is a comment on the alleged looting that took place all over the city in the wake of Hurricane Katrina. This piece has since been damaged and painted over, but the buildings owner has had it removed and is looking to restore it to its former glory. This was a message to get acroos that this wrong. In New Orleans, in front of a hospital.

p.title: Looting Soldier
p.credit: By: Theodore Rayne from New Orleans US, https://www.nola.com/arts/2017/11/banksy_graffiti_new_orleans_re.html
